Question: This person was one of the many celebrities who appeared chanting "Ghostbusters" in Ray Parker, Jr.'s hit "single" for the movie.
Hints: This person played American sheriff Bud Boomer who led an "invasion" of Canada.
A tribute to this person was hosted by Dan Aykroyd at the 2007 Grey Cup festivities in Toronto in November 2007.
This person also produced and starred in a Saturday-morning animated series on NBC entitled Camp **** in 1989.
